repositories.description: Map of maven repositories to access for fetching maven artifacts. If not defined and no settings.xml provided with remote repositories, then the mule runtime will work in offline mode

url.description: URL to access the maven repository

globalSettingsLocation.description: Location of the maven global settings.xml file. It can be a classpath reference in which case the file can be placed in the MULE_HOME/conf folder or an absolute path to the file. If defined, the repositories and proxies configured on it will be used by the runtime

userSettingsLocation.description: Location of the maven user settings.xml file. It can be a classpath reference in which case the file can be placed in the MULE_HOME/conf folder or an absolute path to the file. If defined, the repositories and proxies configured on it will be used by the runtime. If a global settings is configured, it will be merged with the user settings

repositoryLocation.description: Repository location for the mule runtime to use. If not provided it will be the MULE_HOME/repository folder
